newsletter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
newsletter.subtitle: Stay up to date with the latest news and updates from our team.
newsletter.terms: By subscribing, you agree to receive our newsletter and agree with our Privacy Policy. You can unsubscribe at any time.

steps.title: This is how it works
steps.subtitle: Follow these steps to get started with your new project.
steps.step1Description: Get the template from the marketplace and unzip it. Make sure you have the latest stable version of Node.js installed.
steps.step2Description: Edit the content after reading the instructions. You can add or remove languages, create new pages, and more.
steps.step3Description: Deploy the project to your preferred hosting provider. I would recommend for the ease to use Vercel.
steps.step4Description: You are all set! Enjoy your new project and let me know if you need any help.

questions.question: Where can I acquire this template?
questions.answer: You can acquire this template on my Gumroad website.

questions.question: What technologies does this template use?
questions.answer: The template uses the latest version of Next.js (15), along with Tailwind CSS, ShadCN, Buttondown for the newsletter, and Formspree for contact forms.

questions.question: How can I customize the content?
questions.answer: The content is easily customizable in JSON files. Everything is explained in the project documentation.

questions.question: Can I expand this project?
questions.answer: Yes, you can expand the project by following the same structure and dynamics as provided.

questions.question: Is this site accessible?
questions.answer: Yes, this site is highly accessible and abides by WCAG 2.2 AA standards.

contact.title: Contact
contact.consent: I agree to the processing of my data according to the privacy policy.
contact.thankYou: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you as soon as possible.

error404.title: Error 404 - Page not found
error404.description: Hi, it seems you are lost in the vastness of the internet. Don't worry, I'm here to help you. If you need help, don't hesitate to contact me at manusansan22@gmail.com.
error404.moreInfo: Try going back to the homepage or the previous page. Thanks for your patience!

youtube.text: By clicking the button, you agree to the processing of your data regarding the YouTube video.
